title: James Martin, SJ
subtitle: My friend Didace Kamagunga, a Ugandan refugee, painted this Madonna and Child 25 years ago in Nairobi. Didaces' art reminds me that the Holy Family were not only refugees for a time (on their Flight into Egypt) but that they were most likely poor. More: https://www.facebook.com/FrJamesMartin/photos/a.139618381495/10156566778191496/?type=3&av=46899546495&eav=AfZiU2Aj2gOuyhI7lQa7NIkRpdpx2dr8sr3X1WU-4XWL-HfnjmEXZB1kd-0WFaT1lbI&theater¬†‚Ä¶pic.twitter.com/sGcG1YdsKr
